page.title: 14WESTON HOSPITAL (CONT.)
page.content: {INDUSTRIAL THERAPY.}Some of the patients spend part of the day doing a simple job for which they are paid.Packing hair rollers into plastic bags is a common example.At other times they may be engaged in { {occupational therapy }or hobbies. Patients are taken on regular {holidays}to the seaside.Last year a group was taken to {Belgium. Each patient receives either a {pension} or a {mobility allowance} which he or she may spend in any way. The hospital administrator is hoping to install a computer to help him keep track of each patient's money. The hospital is fairly isolated from the village of Weston Under Wetherley,but local people are encouraged to visit.
